segments.text: My attention shifts back to the children, and a sense of unease starts to creep in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is still perched on that two-step stool, reaching high into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool itself looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out at odd angles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It appears to be tilting backward, almost imperceptibly, but enough to worry me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, one shift in weight, and he could easily tumble backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so intent on those cookies that he seems unaware of the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, completely oblivious to the precarious situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm holding my breath, anticipating the sound of a crash and a cry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a heart-stopping moment, watching him teeter like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them, but I'm just an observer in this frozen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height onto a hard kitchen floor could be quite serious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors just frame his risky endeavor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope he manages to grab his cookie and get down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is making me genuinely anxious for his well-being.
segments.speaker: PAR
